title: The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency
author: Alexander McCall Smith
description: Set in Africa, with an engaging heroine who could give Miss Marple a run for her money.

title: The Night Manager
author: John Le Carr√©
description: Former British intelligence officer Jonathan Pine attempts to infiltrate the entourage of Roper, a sinister and powerful Englishman responsible for fitting together the pieces for a monumental arms-for-cocaine deal. Reprint.

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon
description: YA. Murder mystery. Despite his overwhelming fear of interacting with people, Christopher, a mathematically-gifted, autistic fifteen-year-old boy, decides to investigate the murder of a neighbour's dog and uncovers secret information about his mother. Whitbread book of the year 2003. WAYRBA list 2005.

title: The Road to Gandolfo
author: Robert Ludlum
description: A humourous tale where the premis is to kidnap Pope Francesco I and ransom him off for every catholic in the world.
